home.title: Upload Your Files
home.subtitle: Drag files here or click the button below

apiDocs.title: API Documentation
apiDocs.description: Complete guide to using Kabox API

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Kabox services, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you disagree with any part, you are not permitted to use our services.

service.title: Service Description
service.content: Kabox provides a CDN (Content Delivery Network) platform for uploading, storing, and distributing media files. The service is free for personal and commercial use with applicable limitations.

usage.title: Permitted Use
usage.content: You are permitted to use this service for: storing images, videos, documents, and other media files; sharing links to uploaded files; using API for application integration. You must comply with applicable laws and not use the service for illegal activities.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Use
prohibited.content: Strictly prohibited to use the service for: illegal content, child pornography, malware, viruses, phishing, spam, fraud, copyright infringement, or activities that damage the service. Violations will result in permanent blocking.

privacy.title: Privacy and Data
privacy.content: We value your privacy. Uploaded files are stored in secure cloud infrastructure. We do not sell user data. Access logs are stored for security and analysis. You can delete files anytime.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Service is provided 'as is'. We are not responsible for data loss, damage, or losses arising from service use. We strive to maintain 99.9% uptime but do not guarantee continuous availability.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to change these terms anytime. Changes will be announced on the website. Continued use after changes means acceptance of new terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about these terms, contact us at akaanakbaik17@proton.me
